scriptComments.dev:serve: Run the node server, watch dist/ and public/ for changes and restart
scriptComments.dev:build: Watch src/ for changes and rebuild using tsc
scriptComments.dev:sync-client: Watch ../client/dist/ for changes and copy to public/
scriptComments.dev:sync-public: Watch ../../public/ for changes and copy to public/
scriptComments.dev: Run build watcher, serve watcher, and sync watchers concurrently
scriptComments.pre:build: Clean dist and public directories (prepare for build)
scriptComments.build: Build the server using tsc, copy client and public to dist/

scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "pnpm run dev:build" "pnpm run dev:serve" "pnpm run dev:sync-client" "pnpm run dev:sync-public"
scripts.pre:build: pnpm run clean-client && pnpm run clean-public
scripts.build: pnpm run pre:build && tsc -p tsconfig.json && pnpm run copy-client && pnpm run copy-public
